jcr:content.awardContent1: Scholarships to U. S. high-school aged students for overseas study of seven critical foreign languages: Arabic, Chinese (Mandarin), Hindi, Korean, Persian (Tajiki), Russian and Turkish.
jcr:content.awardName1: National Security Language Initiative for Youth (NSLI-Y)
jcr:content.awardReq1: U.S. citizen Grade point average (GPA) of 2.5 or higher on a 4.0 scale, or equivalent 15-18 years of age at start of program Enrolled in high school (including home school) Have not previously traveled outside the U.S. on a long-term (more than eight weeks) program sponsored by the Bureau of Educational and Cultural Affairs, Department of State
